title: Emotes
body: I like the new idea on emotes but I hate how it replaces the mastery system, Flashing mastery emote was a nice thing to do every so often but now the thing is way too big and has basically no cooldown between the emote also the icon that appears on the screen showing your champion and a message like 'RivenPro is on a killing spree' or 'IPlayAatrox has slain IDontPlayAatrox' the icon would have your mastery level around it indicating your experience with the champion when you get a first blood or a triple kill or anything that involves your icon appearing on every screen, I don't like how this has been removed as it leaves some form of emptiness when it appears and isn't as fulfilling when you do get a first blood or a pentakill it worked as a way to show off your mastery on the champion by not actually bm'ing and now its just been merged in with emotes, Emotes are fine but combining the mastery with the emotes isn't. Honestly, just a small thing that bugs me a lot.

replies.body: I was thinking the same thing, I kind of feel like there is no point in getting masteries on champs anymore since I can't really show off without using this giant mastery thing lol
